bun tsc passes

userStories.title: CI: purge Cloudflare cache on deploy for sitemap + key pages

Uses CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN + CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID
Fails loudly if env vars missing
bun tsc passes
userStories.notes: Speeds SEO iteration; prevents stale content.

Submission stores email + report id (KV/D1) OR sends email via existing provider
If Turnstile is added: server verifies token
bun dev verification: submit works end-to-end
bun tsc passes
userStories.notes: Even without ads, this turns traffic into a list.
